name: jupyter-scatter
description: A scatter plot extension for Jupyter Notebook and Lab
author: Fritz Lekschas

scripts.clean: npm run ssl && rimraf dist/ && rimraf ../jscatter/labextension/ && rimraf ../jscatter/nbextension
scripts.prepare: npm run ssl && npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build:prod
scripts.build: npm run ssl && webpack --mode=development && npm run build:labextension:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run ssl && webpack --mode=production && npm run build:labextension
scripts.build:labextension: npm run ssl && jupyter labextension build .
scripts.build:labextension:dev: npm run ssl && jupyter labextension build --development True .
scripts.lint: npm run ssl && eslint src embed.js extension.js get-version-info.js index.js labplugin.js
scripts.test: npm run ssl && npm run lint
